targets.query:
area=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${area}")
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)
  

from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "room")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "money")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area_id"] == area.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["room_id"] !~ /^WC.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= -10.0)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)  
  |> unique(column: "room_id")
  |> sum(column: "_value")

area=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${area}")
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)

house=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "house")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area_id"] == area.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${floor}")
  |> unique(column: "id")  
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)  

from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "room")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "money")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["house_id"] == house.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["room_id"] !~ /^WC.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= -10.0)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)  
  |> unique(column: "room_id")
  |> group(columns: ["_field","_start","_stop"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

area=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${area}")
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)

house=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "house")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area_id"] == area.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${floor}")
  |> unique(column: "id")  
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)  

from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "room")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "money")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["house_id"] == house.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["room_id"] !~ /^WC.*/)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)  
  |> unique(column: "room_id")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","room_id","_value"])

area=from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "${area}")
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => key._field == "name", idx: 0)

from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "room")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "money")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area_id"] == area.id)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["room_id"] !~ /^WC.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 0)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)  
  |> unique(column: "room_id")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","room_id","_value"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> drop(columns: ["id",])  
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "id"])
list.label: 楼栋
list.name: area
list.query:
from(bucket: "hniu")
  |> range(start: 2023-02-11T22:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "area")
  |> drop(columns: ["id",])  
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "id"])

list.name: floor
